oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Falls Building
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: “Falls Building” Color image of city of Memphis from the river, with an arrow specifically pointing at the Falls Building in downtown.

“Downtown Memphis, Tennessee about 1962-63 before the sweeping architectural changes and new buildings [handwritten] -- Falls Building -- Memphis, Tennessee -- Are You Paying More For Office Space And Getting Less? Then Join The Switch To The Falls Building -- On the bluffs of the Mississippi over-looking historic Confederate Park. Personalized offices for the most dis-criminating tenant. Convenient to banks, post office, 3 parking garages, 2 large parking areas, public transport-tation and downtown air port. Edward LeMaster Company -- Building Managers -- 628 Falls Building -- 527-8521 [typed/pre-printed]”
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Falls Building; downtown; riverfront; business; cityscapes;
